item.title: Contributions
item.description: Overview of my contribution as part of different organizations. ToC ToC RecommendIT - Signify RecommendIT - HeidelbergCement ITG EcoTech Orbix Central registrar AUBG HHIB PoC CXG Mystery shopping platform (PoC) VSTO Outlook plugin (PoC) Survey builder application Others Fish farm automation Medical device, data collector RecommendIT - Signify Description - Customer experience platform with additional analytics. The company that use the software is the biggest smart lighting seller.
